entities.name: hufflepuff
entities.description: The Hufflepuff table is mentioned as a specific location where students are sitting.

entities.name: fat friar
entities.description: The ghost of the Fat Friar is waving merrily at Susan.

entities.name: susan
entities.description: Susan is called out to sit next to Hannah at the Hufflepuff table.

entities.name: hannah
entities.description: Hannah is mentioned as someone Susan sits next to at the Hufflepuff table.

entities.name: terry
entities.description: Terry is called out and joins the Ravenclaw table.

entities.name: ravenclaw
entities.description: The Ravenclaw table claps when Terry joins them.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender becomes the first new Gryffindor.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: The table on the far left explodes with cheers when Lavender joins Gryffindor.

entities.name: ron's twin brothers
entities.description: Ron's twin brothers are mentioned as catcalling when Lavender joins Gryffindor.

entities.name: slytherin
entities.description: The students who become Slytherins are described as an unpleasant lot by Harry.

relationships.description: Susan is assigned to the Hufflepuff table.
Lavender becomes the first new Gryffindor.
